The goals of the Open Font License (OFL)

to provide a free and open framework in
which fonts may be shared and improved
in partnership with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be
used, studied, modified and

not sold by themselves. The fonts,

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names

as distributed by the Copyright
Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any

porting the Font Software to a new
environment.

"Author" refers to any designer,
